book.synopsis: Now in paperback! Here is the book that updates the rulebook, giving parents the training and skills they need to transform their teenage children into strong, confident, productive adults.
book.title_long: Yes, Your Teen is Crazy!: Loving Your Kid Without Losing Your Mind
